CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the View Content stage positioned above or below the Share Content stage?
SRP.A: The View Content stage is positioned {above} the Share Content stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Follow Account?
VE.A: The value of stage Follow Account is {282}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Participate in Paid Subscription?
VE.A: The value of stage Participate in Paid Subscription is {87}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Like or Comment?
VE.A: The value of stage Like or Comment is {417}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Content, with a value of {482}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Participate in Paid Subscription, with a value of {87}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload?
SC.A: Decreased by {70} Million Users from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 319? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Content} stage has {482}, the {Like or Comment} stage has {417}, the {Share Content} stage has {356}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 247? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {213}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {143}, the {Participate in Paid Subscription} stage has {87}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 178 and 319? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Follow Account} stage has {282}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {213}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, from stage Like or Comment to Share Content, or from stage View Content to Like or Comment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Join Group or Community} to stage {Content Creation or Upload} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Content Creation or Upload to Participate in Paid Subscription, from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to stage {Follow Account} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Share Content} and {Follow Account} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Content Creation or Upload} and {Participate in Paid Subscription} stages.
